title: Mathematics Teacher Mentoring Competency Enhancement Program Through Collaborative Reflection

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Offline-centered environment with smartphone-based resource access, requiring a continuous feedback system through formative assessments

learning_goals: During the mentoring process, collaborative reflective questioning tools are used to analyze and reflect on teachers' instructional practice cases at least three times.
Through peer feedback exchange, learners propose solutions to resolve at least two problem situations encountered during mathematics lesson design.

Learners will create an action plan to improve school mentoring culture, including three core strategies (monthly teacher-student mentoring sessions, quarterly peer teacher competency workshops, biannual mentoring effectiveness evaluation), pilot it within three months, achieve ≥70% participation, and score ≥4.0/5.0 on satisfaction surveys.

resources: A4 Printable Materials for Offline Group Activities
Basic Smartphone App with Voice Recording Functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
